name: export-content-type-details-to-csv
title: Export Content Type Details To CSV
shortDescription: This script exports all content types available on sites to CSV.
longDescription: This script exports all content types available on sites, including basic information such as Name, ID, Scope, Schema, Fields, and more, into a CSV format.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
